{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = <!-- tagline --> |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none -->
|brand = Intel |model = Centrino Advanced-N 6205 |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = 62205ANSFF |page_start_date = October 12, 2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Intel_Centrino_Advanced-N_6205_(62205ANHMWDTX1) |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = AN600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = M.2 |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = M.2 |formfactor = 4222
|vendor_id = 8086 |device_id = 0085 |subvendor_id = 8085 |subdevice_id = c220 |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = PD962205ANSU |icid = 1000M-62205ANSU |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 84:3A:4B, 8C:70:5A
|chip1 = Intel;82549MDE;i, 82549MDE, S133NN73, SLJ43, (M)(C)'09, TAIWAN (e1); |chip2 = Intel;DK82548RDE;i, DK82548RDE, W130AK0N, SLHBY, (M)(C)'09 (e3), SINGAPORE; |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = MHF4 |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = No |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = DFS, |802dot11_protocols = abgn |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 02/04/2012 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00LP3G8S4 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== *This module appears to be used in some '''[[Lenovo]]''' products, such as :the [http://download.lenovo.com/ibmdl/pub/pc/pccbbs/mobiles_pdf/0c10324.pdf '''X1 Carbon''']. It's presumed to be using MHF4 RF connectors.
==Links of Interest== :[https://www.intel.com/content/www/us/en/support/network-and-i-o/wireless-networking/legacy-intel-wireless-products/intel-wireless-series/intel-centrino-advanced-n-6205-dual-band.html Support page]
==Forum threads== *[https://bbs.archlinux.org/viewtopic.php?pid=1309643 Probable PCI ID mention on the '''Arch Linux''' forums] :PCI ID: [http://pci-ids.ucw.cz/read/PC/8086/0085 8086:0085] (8086:c220), [[iwlwifi]] [''Taylor Peak''] *[https://www.tonymacx86.com/threads/lenovo-x1-carbon-1st-gen-type-3444.226357/ ''Lenovo X1 Carbon 1st Gen (Type 3444)'' on '''TonyMACx86''' forums] :OUI: 8C:70:5A, FRU P/N: 04W3769, NGFF M.2 (42x22 mm)
[[Category:English Documentation]]
